mapper.select: SELECT s.*, sa.name as shop_admin_name, sa.email as shop_admin_email FROM qr_manage_shop s LEFT JOIN qr_manage_shop_admin sa ON s.shop_admin_id = sa.id WHERE s.shop_admin_id = #{shopAdminId}
SELECT s.*, sa.name as shop_admin_name, sa.email as shop_admin_email FROM qr_manage_shop s LEFT JOIN qr_manage_shop_admin sa ON s.shop_admin_id = sa.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qr_manage_shop (shop_admin_id, name, description, address, phone, is_visible, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{shopAdminId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{isVisible}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE qr_manage_shop SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, shop_id, day_of_week, is_holiday, open_time, close_time FROM qr_manage_business_hours WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} ORDER BY day_of_week
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qr_manage_business_hours (shop_id, day_of_week, is_holiday, open_time, close_time, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{shopId}, #{dayOfWeek}, #{isHoliday}, #{openTime}, #{closeTime}, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE is_holiday = #{isHoliday}, open_time = #{openTime}, close_time = #{closeTime}, updated_at = NOW()
